[![The AI Conference logo for The AI Conference 2023, a groundbreaking two-day event on AGI, LLMs, Infrastructure, Alignment, AI Startups, and Neural Architectures.](https://aiconference.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/AI_Conference.png)](https://aiconference.com/)

[REGISTER](https://aiconference.com/#tickets)

The AI Conference 2025 FAQ

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

These are the most frequently asked questions about The AI Conference 2025.
If you don't see an answer you’re looking for, **email us** at info@aiconference.com and we’ll be happy to assist you!

[EMAIL US](mailto:info@aiconference.com)

## General Event Info

Can I attend this event virtually?

This is an **in-person event only.** We promote community and networking and hope to see you there.

Where is this event located?

This is an **in-person event** at **Pier 48,**Mission Rock, San Francisco, CA 94158

When is the event?

The AI Conference takes place on SEPTEMBER 17th – 18th, 2025 beginning at 8:00 AM PST.

How can my company sponsor The AI Conference?

Please visit: [aiconference.com/sponsors/](https://aiconference.com/sponsors/) for all **exhibitor opportunities**.

Where can I park My Car

The most up to date parking info can be found at  [**Park** Wiz](https://www.parkwhiz.com/pier-48-parking/?daily=1)

## The AI Conference 2025 Cost to Attend

How much does The AI Conference 2025 cost?

The conference has **Early Bird pricing** while supplies last. For those who miss our early pricing, the current price of the standard passes can be found on the registration page after launch.

Under what circumstances do you offer discounts?

**Group rates** are available to groups of three or more attendees registering together. Contact [tickets@aiconference.com](mailto:tickets@aiconference.com) to receive a group rate discount code.

Do you offer discounts or complimentary passes?

For groups of two or more people registering together, **discounted group rates** are available. To obtain a discount code for group rates, please contact [tickets@aiconference.com](mailto:tickets@aiconference.com)

What is the Cancellation policy?

The AI Conference offers refunds up to 30 days prior to an event. A fee of 5% will be charged for all refunds. Email [tickets@aiconference.com](mailto:tickets@aiconference.com) for refund requests.

Is there a code of conduct?

Please view our code of conduct at [aiconference.com/code-of-conduct/](https://aiconference.com/code-of-conduct/)

## Registration for The AI Conference 2025

I have a press, vendor, or speaker pass. What now?

The AI Conference will be sending a series of emails that include everything needed to navigate the event including information about meals, transportation, maps, and tips and tricks to getting the most out of your experience.

Can I present at the conference?

We will open submissions for this year’s conference speakers soon. Be sure to sign up for our [speakers interest list](https://aiconference.com/cfp/) to be notified.

How do I get a press pass?

If you are a **member of the press**, you can apply for a media pass shortly.

## Presentation information

Who will be speaking at the conference?

**2 DAYS \| [4 TRACKS](https://aiconference.com/#tracks) \| 85+ SPEAKERS**

Our ever updating list of speakers, presenters, and sponsors can be found at [aiconference.com](https://aiconference.com/)

How long will presentations be?

Presentations will be broken into 3 types: Keynote presentations lasting 40 minutes and featured contributors with a duration of 20 minutes. Vendor and sponsor presentations may vary in time and may be revisited throughout the duration of the conference.

What topics will be covered?

A wide range of topics will be covered including: AGI development, Foundation Models and Large Language Models, Generative AI, Neural Architectures, AI Infrastructure, AI Use Cases, Ethics and Alignment, Data Management tools for AI, AI Startups & Investment, and more.

Are there multiple presentation areas?

There are 4 main areas at The AI Conference. Four presentation halls, a vendor and sponsor presentation area, and an atrium area where networking mixers and food & beverages are served. In addition there are multiple indoor and outdoor networking areas with tables for dining and networking.

Information on the four is found here: [Tracks](https://aiconference.com/#tracks)

![](https://aiconference.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/best-places-to-visit-in-San-Francisco.jpg)

## Which hotels are near the event?

Luma Hotel San Francisco

100 Channel St

San Francisco, CA 94158

0.3 mile / 6 min walk

Direct: 415-266-9999

**Booking cut off date: 8/29/2025**

LUMA Hotel San Francisco is where modern elegance meets the energy of Mission Bay. With sleek design, intuitive technology, and panoramic rooftop views, it’s a refined retreat at the heart of the city’s innovation district.

-Book discounted rates below before the cutoff date!
